FeedItems.Title: NuGet.org will continue to support TLS 1.0 and 1.1 until further notice
FeedItems.Summary: Last November, we shared our two-stage plan for deprecating TLS 1.0/1.1 on NuGet.org and actions you can take today to ensure your systems use TLS 1.2. In that post, we announced that NuGet.org would...

FeedItems.Title: Deprecating TLS 1.0 and 1.1 on NuGet.org
FeedItems.Summary:
co-authored by Scott Bommarito
At Microsoft, using the latest and secure encryption techniques is very important to us to ensure the security and privacy of our customers. TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1,...

FeedItems.Title: Deprecating packages on nuget.org
FeedItems.Summary: We are excited to announce that nuget.org now supports package deprecation. This has been a long standing ask that will help the ecosystem use supported packages. As a package publisher on nuget.org,...

FeedItems.Title: Enable repeatable package restores using a lock file

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Installing EntityFramework to asp.net core" (#8025) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Events.RelatedBody:
Hi All,

I'm currently struggling to install Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore to my project. When I run dotnet restore. The is a list of packages that aren't found

**This is my .csproj**
`<Project Sdk="Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web">
  <PropertyGroup>
    <TargetFramework>netcoreapp3.1</TargetFramework>
  </PropertyGroup>
  <ItemGroup>
  </ItemGroup>
  <ItemGroup>
    <PackageReference Include="Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore" Version="3.1.3"/>
  </ItemGroup>
</Project>`
**This is what I get when I run dotnet restore**
PS C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend> dotnet restore
  Determining projects to restore...
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1101: Unable to find package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Abstractions. No packages exist with this id in source(s): LocalSource, Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1101: Unable to find package Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Analyzers. No packages exist with this id in source(s): LocalSource, Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1101: Unable to find package Microsoft.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces. No packages exist with this id in source(s): LocalSource, Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1101: Unable to find package Microsoft.Bcl.HashCode. No packages exist with this id in source(s): LocalSource, Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1101: Unable to find package Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.Memory. No packages exist with this id in source(s): LocalSource, Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1101: Unable to find package Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection. No packages exist with this id in source(s): LocalSource, Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1101: Unable to find package Microsoft.Extensions.Logging. No packages exist with this id in source(s): LocalSource, Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1102: Unable to find package System.Collections.Immutable with version (>= 1.7.0)
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1102:   - Found 2 version(s) in Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages [ Nearest version: 1.2.0 ]
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1102:   - Found 0 version(s) in LocalSource
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1102: Unable to find package System.ComponentModel.Annotations with version (>= 4.7.0)
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1102:   - Found 2 version(s) in Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages [ Nearest version: 4.1.0 ]
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1102:   - Found 0 version(s) in LocalSource
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1102: Unable to find package System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource with version (>= 4.7.0)
C:\Users\DELL\Desktop\New_folder\backend\backend.csproj : error NU1102:   - Found 1 version(s) in Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages [ Nearest version: 4.0.0 ]

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "[ReleasePrep][2020-06-08] RI dev to master" (#8027) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Merged pull request "[A11y]Fix input group read out from table to nothing." (#8003) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Events.RelatedBody: Updates some css so the input row on upload page doesn't get read out as a table.

Events.RelatedDescription: Opened issue "[Accessibility]Remove all display:table where display is not a table" (#8026) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Events.RelatedBody:
We have in quite a few places, a display:table style for display purposes.
This causes some screen reader to misinterpret this section as a table even though it is not.

https://github.com/NuGet/NuGetGallery/pull/8003 fixes a few of them, but we should go through and remove any other places where we do this incorrect behaviour.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Long usernames break 'profile' and 'display package' pages" (#7809) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Events.RelatedBody:
For example: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech/

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/737941/72480322-edfdf400-37ab-11ea-8082-165cce6dd174.png)

Also: https://www.nuget.org/profiles/Microsoft.CognitiveServices.Speech

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/737941/72480529-898f6480-37ac-11ea-95e3-4aded980fabc.png)

We should consider truncating the username.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Some tests fails due to culture and line endings" (#7779) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Events.RelatedBody:
### To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Using this git commit of NuGetGallery '705020bef78e677b41b3303d2eb02c79e165a652'
2. Run tests when current culture is Russian (i.e. ru-...)
3. See:
NuGetGallery.Security.MicrosoftTeamSubscriptionFacts.Policies_ReturnsMicrosoftTeamSubscriptionPolicies:
 Assert.Equal() Failure
                                     ↓ (pos 958)
    Expected: ···r more information.\r\nPolicy violations: {0}"}
    Actual:   ···r more information.\nPolicy violations: {0}"}
                                     ↑ (pos 958)


NuGetGallery.Packaging.PackageMetadataFacts.ThrowsForEmptyAndNonEmptyDuplicatesWhenDuplicateMetadataElementsDetectedAndParsingIsNotStrict
 
    Assert.Equal() Failure
              ↓ (pos 0)
    Expected: An item with the same key has already bee···
    Actual:   Элемент с тем же ключом уже был добавлен.
              ↑ (pos 0)


NuGetGallery.Packaging.PackageMetadataFacts.ThrowsWhenInvalidMinClientVersion(strict: True)
    Assert.Equal() Failure
                                       ↓ (pos 38)
    Expected: ···id version string.\r\nParameter name: value
    Actual:   ···id version string.\r\nИмя параметра: value
                                       ↑ (pos 38)

and so on

### Expected behavior
Tests work OK

### Additional context
It would be better to have localized strings in test asserts where it causes test failures.

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Fix unit test failed due to localized culture and line ending (#7779)" (#8021) at NuGet/NuGetGallery
Events.RelatedBody:
Summary of the changes:

* Change to Assert.StartWith instead of Assert.Equal, avoid checking localized 'parameter'  
* Add new class called 'UseInvariantCultureAttribute', change thread UI culture before test, and reset 
   after test
* Addressed those unit test:  1.NuGetGallery.Packaging.PackageMetadataFacts.ThrowsForEmptyAndNonEmptyDuplicatesWhenDuplicateMetadataElementsDetectedAndParsingIsNotStrict
2. NuGetGallery.Packaging.PackageMetadataFacts.ThrowsWhenInvalidMinClientVersion
3.NuGetGallery.PackagesControllerFacts+TheUploadFileActionForPostRequests.WillRejectBrokenZipFiles  NuGetGallery.PackagesControllerFacts+TheUploadFileActionForPostRequests.WillShowViewWithErrorsIfPackageIdIsBreaksParsing
4.NuGetGallery.Authentication.AuthenticationServiceFacts+TheAuthenticateMethod.GivenPasswordCredential_ItThrowsArgumentException
5.NuGetGallery.Diagnostics.DiagnosticsServiceFacts+TheGetSourceMethod.RequiresNonNullOrEmptyName
6.NuGetGallery.Services.ContentServiceFacts+TheGetContentItemMethod.GivenANullOrEmptyName_ItShouldThrow
 

Addresses https://github.com/NuGet/NuGetGallery/issues/123
